entry.title: PHP CODE AUDIT - 0001 - AttckForWork
entry.content:
This php code was obtained during a code audit during my testing. I was very excited to see this, and decided to simulate it for everyone to learn.

KnowLedGePoint

  • Count
  • Error_reproting
  • Sizeof
  • Strlen

Call_user_func
entry.summary: This php code was obtained during a code audit during my testing. I was very excited to see this, and decided to simulate it for everyone

entry.title: APT - AttckForWork
entry.content:
APT is an insane difficulty Windows machine where RPC and HTTP services are only exposed. Enumeration of existing RPC interfaces provides an interesting object that can be used to disclose the IPv6 address. The box is found to be protected by a firewall exemption that over IPv6 can give access to a backup share. User enumeration and bruteforce attacks can give us access to the registry which contains login credentials. The machine is configured to allow authentication via the NTLMv1 protocol, which is then can be leveraged to gain system access.

KnowLedGePoint

  • RPC enumeration
  • Port Forwarding
  • Remote Registry
  • Exploiting NTLMv1
  • Hashdump

IP PORT SCAN

Usually we will use nmap to scan the port information of ip：)

Nmap Scan

Impacket

Port 135 may have a lot of sensitive information leaked

RPCMAP

Brute uuids view successful

We take the uuid to Microsoft’s official website to query.

Example

Source: [MS-DCOM]: Standards Assignments | Microsoft Docs

UUID IObjectExporter

Use impacket to IObjectExporter

Great, we got the ipv6 address of the host

Nmap

Our current information is Domain|ipv6|Hostname

impacket smbclient

whereis apt? Nmap put Apt for ipv6

unzip

unzip prompt have password ↓

zip2john

Use zip2john save hash

Fcrackzip

Fcrackzip Brute Force Ziphash

Hash extract

Extracting the contents provides us with the NTDS database as well as with the SECURITY and SYSTEM registry hives. This can be used to obtain NTLM hashes for all users existing during this snapshot. We can use impacket’s secretsdump to extract the hashes.

crackmapexec

Use Cme Concat user

PyKerbrute

Use hash brete

Reg

Evil-winrm

Responder And MpCmdRun

After that, I can start Responder to listen on my tun0 interface and use the --lm option which will downgrade the authentication to NTLMv1.

Now on APT Server, I can force authentication with MpCmdRun.exe (located on C:\Program Files\Windows Defender).

Hashdump

NTLM Hash of a computer account can not be used for remote login. Instead, it can be used to perform DCSync attack using secretsdump.py. I’ll take only the administrator hash.

Use Administrator Hash login Apt domain
entry.summary: APT is an insane difficulty Windows machine where RPC and HTTP services are only exposed. Enumeration of existing RPC interfaces provides
